body: Now I want to get this right this time and really commit to making a good team but how do you do this when people see the number of members and just say no? I would also like anyone to give me ideas on how to make the team grow or be successful!
body_tagged: Now I want to get this right this time and really commit to making a good team but how do you do this when people see the number of members and just say no? I would also like anyone to give me ideas on how to make the team grow or be successful!
title: Team Help?

replies.body: Had to read this twice, now I understand. Coming from me, you may thing my feedback is probably "Bad" considering my team was failure but, I started off by making a "Looking for Members" post and then I went to the "Looking for team" post and got some members there. If no one apply's or wants to join, I just simply ask randies in game and train them. Hope this helped!

replies.body: And how many of them have gotten denied already? Many people will join a newer team to get the experience to get a better chance to be accepted on better/older teams. But if you can get the right people and train correctly you can get a successful team and be the same or even better than the original team that your player(s) wanted to join.
